title: Adventures in Trichology
description: This Special Hardcover Edition contains the Author's Preface.In a seaside town on the south coast of England you’ll find Norman Baker, the quaint proprietor of a hairdressing salon. He is not the quintessential hairdressing type and can be, if you’ll excuse the paronomasia, quite cutting!Behind the respectable façade of a small town, Norman’s salon is nothing short of a beauty parlor confessional, where his quirky clientele expose their dirty secrets, bizarre sexual antics, comedic mishaps and even murder.Full of hot gossip, laughter, love and the occasional melancholy event, Norman Baker presents his Adventures in Trichology.
author: Nicholas A. Price
